name: ice-fang
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.sword-shield: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: The user bites the target with cold-infused fangs to deal damage. This may also leave the target with frostbite.
